scripts.start: npm run parcel && npm run start:firefox
scripts.parcel: npm run parcel:content_scripts && npm run parcel:popup
scripts.parcel:content_scripts: npm run del:content_scripts && parcel build content_scripts/beastify.js -d addon/content_scripts --experimental-scope-hoisting --no-minify --no-source-maps
scripts.parcel:popup: npm run del:popup && parcel build popup/choose_beast.html -d addon/popup --public-url ./ --no-minify --no-source-maps
